title: Dollar Share in Reserves Drops Below 60%, Yuan Rises, Russian Diplomat Says
description: The share of currencies other than the U.S. dollar and the euro in international reserves is on the rise, according to a Russian representative. The trend is being observed as a growing number of countries try to use their national currencies in foreign trade settlements, the official noted. Russia Sees Alternative Currencies Like Chinese Yuan […]

title: Growing Use of ChatGPT in Homeschooling
description: In a recent nationwide survey, an intriguing trend has emerged in education. More homeschool educators are incorporating artificial intelligence (AI) tools into their teaching practices, with ChatGPT being a notable favorite. This shift signifies the growing acceptance of AI in education, especially among homeschooling communities. This article will provide a concise overview of the survey ... Read more

title: Can Ethereum Reclaim $2,000 Amidst Bullish Predictions, Pomerdoge Whale Activity Spikes
description: The crypto market has failed to show a clear trajectory, as bulls and bears continue to struggle. Despite this, experts have given bullish projections for Ethereum (ETH), but can it break above $2,000?
